title.rendered: Yatra.com offers / coupon code: Exclusive Offer With MobiKwik Wallet

content.rendered:
You can use MobiKwik wallet, a safe and secure payment method for thrilling deals with Yatra.com and MobiKwik.

Save up to Rs.800 on domestic flights booking made on Yatra through MobiKwik.

This offer is valid on Sunday, Monday & Tuesday in a week till March 31, 2020.

Booking validity: January 12 – 31 March 2020.
Promo Code: YTMBK20

Book your flight tickets with Yatra.com and get Exclusive Offer With MobiKwik Wallet

Terms and conditions:

  • This offer is valid only on online confirmed Mobikwik Wallet Transaction Domestic flights, bookings made through Yatra.com.
  • The offer will be applicable once Per Month During the offer period.
  • The offer is valid on the bookings made between January 12 – March 31, 2020.
  • Valid only on Sundays, Mondays & Tuesdays.
  • The minimum transaction amount in order to avail the Dom flight offer is Rs.3,000.
  • The customer needs to apply to promo code YTMBK20 to avail the discounts.
  • To be eligible for the offer, the user is required to use MobiKwik wallet at Yatra.
  • Cashback will be credited within 24 hours of successful transaction.
  • Offer valid on domestic flights only.
  • On mobile app, the offer is valid on Android and iOS based devices only.
  • Discounts provided under the offer cannot be clubbed with any other offer or discount extended by Yatra as part of any other arrangement.
